item.description:
From the NHL Alumni, Bruins Foundation and Brad Marchand

Entry Deadline April 28 at 5pm

Drawing April 29 at 5:15pm

Game Date To Be Determined

Net raffle proceed benefits the Richard Family Fund, setup in memory of Martin Richard, 8 year old from Dorchester who tragically died in the events of the Boston Marathon.

You and 13 guests will enjoy the first Boston Bruins playoff game of the 2013 Stanley Cup Playoffs in Brad Marchands personal suite followed by a post-game meet and greet with Brad.

http://www.nhlalumniraffles.org/raffles.aspx?id=265

Raffle tickets are $5.00 per ticket with minimum purchase of 2 tickets required to enter.
item.name: Brad Marchand Bruins Game Suite Raffle -NHL Alumni & Bruins Foundation Benefit
